entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Drizzle, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 09:09 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Drizzle
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: ENE 23 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle at times mixed with snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023
